Header.title: Lending Katalyst
Header.paragraph: We simplify the hassle of collateral Title Search Report by providing an instant-on the go decision with zero physical intervention in the journey of secured lending from financial institutions.

Whatwedo.caption: Changing the Game
content: We are a financial technology startup leveraging new age technology to disrupt the long-standing manual procedure that has been plaguing the banking industry.

With Lending Katalyst, we simplify the hassle of collateral Title Search Report by providing an instant-on the go decision with zero physical intervention in the journey of secured lending from financial institutions.

OurTech.caption: The Possibilities Are Endless
content: At Lending Katalyst, we serve our clients through our encrypted dedicated platform using Blockchain technology to provide an easy access to property record and an instant decision on whether the property is a fit for mortgage/collateral in your journey of lending.
This decision is made possible with our unique Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning algorithm.
With strong command over these technologies, we are on a mission to disrupt across the value chain of secured lending.

Contact.address: Building 73, 17th B Main, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore - 560008.

Ourstory.caption: The Beginning
content: Lending Katalyst was born out of curiosity. The inquisitive and customer obsession nature of being a Product Manager saw the technological gap in the banking industry. This led the team to crack the code to bridge the gap. This strong desire of going beyond the conventional practice gave us the purpose to what we are today.
With a clear vision in mind, we are a team of passionate entrepreneurs ready to take on the challenge and face the uncertainty.
If you have the same passion and would like to be a part of this journey, kindly fill out the details in the 'Get In Touch' section. We would love to have you on-board.
